entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 3 April 2023
